property.caption: Empty View
property.description: The view that will be displayed in case the list was empty

property.caption: Scroll View
property.description: Use a scrollview instead of a flatlist. Flatlist functions will not work.

property.caption: On pull down
property.description: Action to be performed when pulling down the list

property.caption: On click
property.description: Action to perform when listview item is pressed.

property.caption: Scroll to item
property.description: Attribute boolean to activate automatic scroll. Scroll item must also be filled!

property.caption: Scroll item
property.description: Contains the index for where to scroll when scroll to item is set to true.

property.caption: Window size
property.description: The number passed here is a measurement unit where 1 is equivalent to your viewport height.

property.caption: Initial nr. of items
property.description: Set initial number of items to render when component mounts.

property.caption: Max. render per batch
property.description: Set number of items to render while scrolling.

property.caption: Batching delay
property.description: Set delay in milliseconds between batch renders.

property.caption: Remove clipped subviews
property.description: Unmounts components that are outside the window.

property.caption: Use getItemLayout
property.description: Use flatlist getItemLayout for scrolling performance. Needs a fixed item height, which can be altered below.
